rules_text:
First strike
When Vlov Arkhangel attacks it deals 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.
When Vlov Arkhangel dies, return it transformed.
rules_text2:
Vigilance, trample
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
Whenever you attack each creature defending player controls doesn’t untap during its controllers next untap step.
When Vlov, Principle of Freezing dies exile it.
